item.title: On the Horizon, Vol. 8
item.description: The 2025 PONI Nuclear Scholars explore the future of nuclear strategy, offering perspectives from emerging experts on disruptive technology, intensifying geopolitical rivalries, and strategic stability.

item.title: China’s Third Policy Paper on Latin America and the Caribbean: Expanding Influence and Ambitions
item.description: China’s third policy paper on Latin America and the Caribbean outlines an institutionalized strategy to deepen regional engagement and secure support for Beijing’s geopolitical goals, with significant implications for U.S. policy in the region and for Taiwan.

item.title: Strengthening National Security Resilience in Japan
item.description: Japan has many strengths that give it tremendous potential for resilience. However, further investments are required to bolster relatively undeveloped elements of national security resilience that China or another foe may seek to exploit.
